sentences.pinyin: Nín shì wǒmen de lǎoshī ma?

sentences.english: How many friends do you have?
Does it like to eat rice?
Hello everyone, I am a teacher.

sentences.pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu lái le.
Wǒ měi tiān dōu xuéxí Hànyǔ.
Zhè gè zì shì líng ma?

sentences.english: I have no small change (zero money).
He wants two cups of water.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yì bǎi kuài qián.
Zhè gè dōngxi yào yì bǎi ma?
sentences.english: Does this thing cost one hundred?

sentences.pinyin: Tā yǒu yì qiān kuài qián ma?
sentences.english: Does he have one thousand yuan?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yì qiān gè píngguǒ.
sentences.english: I want to buy one thousand apples.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de dìyī běn shū.
Tā shì wǒ de dìyī wèi péngyǒu.
Zhè shì wǒ dì yī cì lái zhèlǐ.
sentences.english: This is my first time coming here.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zài qù yí cì.
sentences.english: I want to go one more time.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yí jiàn yīfu.
sentences.english: I bought one piece of clothing.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè jiàn dōngxi shì shéi de?
Wǒ yě yǒu yì běn shū.

sentences.english: I like drinking tea the most.

sentences.pinyin: Tā shì wǒ zuì hǎo de péngyǒu.

sentences.english: I am reading a book right now.

sentences.pinyin: Wǒmen yìqǐ qù chī fàn ba.

sentences.chinese: 你想和我一起看电影吗？
sentences.pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hé wǒ yìqǐ kàn diànyǐng ma?
sentences.english: Do you want to watch a movie together with me?
I want to see him again.
He sleeps as soon as he finishes eating.

sentences.pinyin: Yīnwèi wǒ lèi, suǒyǐ wǒ bù qù.
sentences.english: Because I am tired, so I will not go.

sentences.pinyin: Yīnwèi xiàyǔ, suǒyǐ wǒ zài jiā.
sentences.english: Because it is raining, so I am at home.

sentences.pinyin: Suīrán wǒ lèi, dànshì wǒ xuéxí.
sentences.english: Although I am tired, I still study.

sentences.chinese: 虽然他很大，但是他很可爱。
sentences.pinyin: Suīrán tā hěn dà, dànshì tā hěn kě'ài.
sentences.english: Although he is big, he is very cute.
I go to school from home.

sentences.pinyin: Tā cóng Běijīng lái le ma?
Wǒ jiā lí xuéxiào hěn jìn ma?
sentences.english: Is my home close to the school?
Is it far from here to Beijing?
He is reading the book (in a continuous state).

sentences.pinyin: Tā xiào zhe shuō nǐ hǎo.
sentences.english: She smiles while saying hello to you.
I will go to the airport tomorrow.

sentences.pinyin: Běijīng yǒu yí gè dà jīchǎng ma?
sentences.english: Does Beijing have a big airport?

sentences.pinyin: Wǒ zhù zài nà gè fángjiān.
Zhè tiáo lù hěn cháng ma?
Wǒ bù rènshi zhè tiáo lù.

sentences.english: The cat is on the left side of the table.

To the right of the school is a restaurant.
I sit on your right side.
I don't want to go outside.

I go to school in the morning.

sentences.pinyin: Zǎoshàng hǎo, nǐ chī le ma?

Nǐ zhǐ yǒu liǎng xiǎoshí ma?
sentences.english: Do you only have two hours?

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ yǒu shíjiān bāng wǒ ma?

He was a student last year.

sentences.pinyin: Jīntiān shì wǔ yuè wǔ rì.
Wǒ de shēngrì zài wǔ yuè.

sentences.english: What do you want to do on your birthday?

My older sister is very beautiful.
My younger brother is watching TV.

sentences.pinyin: Nǐ de qīzi zài gōngzuò ma?

sentences.english: Do you like to eat mutton?
